trans-unit.source: In this topic, you will create a new Mobile App backend, download and publish the server project, and download a "todo list" client app that connects to the new Mobile App backend.
trans-unit.target: In this topic, you will create a new Mobile App backend, download and publish the server project, and download a "todo list" client app that connects to the new Mobile App backend.

trans-unit.source: Mobile Apps provides you with all the backend functionality of App Service, but with additional features designed for mobile developers, including offline sync and push notifications.
trans-unit.target: Mobile Apps provides you with all the backend functionality of App Service, but with additional features designed for mobile developers, including offline sync and push notifications.

trans-unit.source: Client SDKs simplify cloud-based data storage and authentication in your apps.
trans-unit.target: Client SDKs simplify cloud-based data storage and authentication in your apps.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [What are Mobile Apps](app-service-mobile-value-prop.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [What are Mobile Apps](app-service-mobile-value-prop.md).
